T06vasvvmsu:1: cittamātraṃ bho jinaputrā yad uta traidhātukam iti sūtrāt |
T06vasvvmsu:2: cittaṃ mano vijñānaṃ vijñaptiś ceti paryāyāḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:10: na ca kṛtyakriyā yuktā vijñaptir yadi nārthataḥ || 2 ||
T06vasvvmsu:12: yadi vinā rūpādyarthena rūpādivijñaptir utpadyate na rūpādyarthāt |
T06vasvvmsu:13: kasmāt kvacid deśa utpadyate na sarvatra |
T06vasvvmsu:14: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid utpadyate na sarvadā |
T06vasvvmsu:15: taddeśakālapratiṣṭhitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃtānāniyama utpadyate na kevalam ekasya |
T06vasvvmsu:17: kasmād yat taimirikaiḥ keśabhramarādi dṛśyate tena keśādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate |
T06vasvvmsu:18: yad annapānavastraviṣāyudhādi svapne dṛśyate tenānnādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate |
T06vasvvmsu:19: gandharvanagareṇāsattvān nagarakriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate |
T06vasvvmsu:20: tasmād asadabhāvāvabhāsane deśakālaniyamaḥ saṃtānāniyamaḥ kṛtyakriyā ca na yujyate |
T06vasvvmsu:23: deśādiniyamaḥ siddhaḥ svapnavat svapna iva svapnavat |
T06vasvvmsu:25: svapne vināpy arthena kvacid eva deśe kiṃcid bhramarārāmastrīpurūṣādikaṃ dṛśyate na sarvatra
T06vasvvmsu:26: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid dṛśyate na sarvakālam iti siddho vināpy arthena deśakālaniyamaḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:35: tulyakarmavipākāvasthā hi pretāḥ sarve 'pi pūyapūrṇāṃ nadīṃ paśyanti naika eva |
T06vasvvmsu:36: yathā pūyapūrṇām evaṃ mūtrapurīṣādipūrṇāṃ daṇḍāsidharaiś ca puruṣair adhiṣṭhitām ity ādigrahaṇena
T06vasvvmsu:37: evaṃ saṃtānāniyamo vijñaptinām asaty apy arthe siddhaḥ ||
T06vasvvmsu:39: yathā svapne dvayasamāpattim antareṇa śukravisargalakṣaṇaḥ svapnopaghātaḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:40: evaṃ tāvad anyānyair dṛṣṭāntair deśakālaniyamādicatuṣṭayaṃ siddhaṃ |
T06vasvvmsu:46: yathā hi narakeṣu nārakāṇāṃ narakapālādidarśanaṃ deśakālaniyamena siddhaṃ
T06vasvvmsu:48: sarveṣāṃ ca naikasyaiva taiś ca tadbādhanaṃ siddham asatsv api narakapālādiṣu samānasvakarmavipākādhipatyāt
T06vasvvmsu:49: tathānyatrāpi sarvam etad deśakālaniyamādicatuṣtayaṃ siddham iti veditavyaṃ ||
T06vasvvmsu:50: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ narakapālās te ca śvāno vāyasāś ca sattvā neṣyante |
T06vasvvmsu:54: parasparaṃ yātayatām ime nārakā ime narakapālā iti vyavasthā na syāt |
T06vasvvmsu:55: tulyākṛtipramāṇabalānāṃ ca parasparaṃ yātayatāṃ na tathā bhayaṃ syāt |
T06vasvvmsu:56: dāhaduḥkhaṃ ca pradīptāyām ayomayyāṃ bhūmāv asahamānāḥ kathaṃ tatra parān yātayeyuḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:59: evaṃ narakeṣu tiryakpretaviśeṣāṇāṃ narakapālādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ syāt |
T06vasvvmsu:60: tiraścāṃ saṃbhavaḥ svarge yathā na narake tathā |
T06vasvvmsu:61: na pretānāṃ yatas tajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te || 5 ||
T06vasvvmsu:62: ye hi tiryañcaḥ svarge saṃbhavanti te tadbhājanalokasukhasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā tatra saṃbhūtās tajjaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
T06vasvvmsu:63: na caiva narakapālādayo nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
T06vasvvmsu:64: tasmān na tiraścāṃ saṃbhavo yukto nāpi pretānāṃ ||
T06vasvvmsu:65: teṣāṃ tarhi (Vvs_5) nārakāṇāṃ karmabhis tatra bhūtaviśeṣāḥ saṃbhavanti varṇākṛtipramāṇabalaviśiṣṭā ye narakapālādisaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante |
T06vasvvmsu:67: yad dvidhāṃ hastavikṣepādikriyāṃ kurvanto dṛśyante bhayotpādanārthaṃ |
T06vasvvmsu:68: yathā meṣākṛtayaḥ parvatā āgacchanto gacchanto 'yaḥśālmalīvane ca kaṇṭakā adhomukhībhavanta ūrddhvamukhībhavantaś ceti |
T06vasvvmsu:70: yadi tatkarmabhis tatra bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavas tathā |
T06vasvvmsu:71: iṣyate pariṇāmaś ca kiṃ vijñānasya neṣyate || 6 ||
T06vasvvmsu:72: vijñānasyaiva tatkarmabhis tathā pariṇāmaḥ kasmān neṣyate kiṃ punar bhūtāni kalpyante ||
T06vasvvmsu:75: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇaṃ || 7 ||
T06vasvvmsu:76: yena hi karmaṇā nārakāṇāṃ tatra tādṛśo bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ kalpyate pariṇāmaś ca tasya karmaṇo vāsanā teṣāṃ vijñānasaṃtānasaṃniviṣṭā nānyatra |
T06vasvvmsu:77: yatraiva ca vāsanā tatraiva tasyāḥ phalaṃ tādṛśo vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kiṃ neṣyate |
T06vasvvmsu:78: yatra vāsanā nāsti tatra tasyāḥ phalaṃ kalpyata iti kim atra kāraṇaṃ ||
T06vasvvmsu:80: yadi vijñānam eva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ syān na rūpādiko
T06vasvvmsu:85: yathāsti sattva upapāduka ity uktaṃ bhagavatā abhiprāyavaśāc cittasaṃtatyanucchedam āyatyām abhipretya |
T06vasvvmsu:86: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmās tv ete sahetukāḥ iti vacanāt |
T06vasvvmsu:87: evaṃ rūpādyāyatanāstitvam apy uktaṃ bhagavatā taddeśanāvineyajanam adhikṛtyety ābhiprāyikaṃ tad vacanaṃ ||
T06vasvvmsu:92: rūpapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād utpadyate tac ca bījaṃ yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā vijñapteś cakṣūrūpāyatanatvena (Vvs_6) yathākramaṃ bhagavān abravīt |
T06vasvvmsu:93: evaṃ yāvat spraṣṭavyapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād utpadyate tac ca bījaṃ yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā kāyaspraṣṭavyāyatanatvena yathākranaṃ bhagavān abravīd ity ayam abhiprāyaḥ
T06vasvvmsu:94: evaṃ punar abhiprāyavaśena deśayitvā ko guṇāḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:95: tathā pudgalanairātmyapraveśo hi tathā hi deśyamāne pudgalanairātmyaṃ praviśanti |
T06vasvvmsu:97: na tu kaścid eko draṣṭāsti na yāvan mantety evaṃ viditvā ye pudgalanairātmyadeśanāvineyās te pudgalanairātmyaṃ praviśanti |
T06vasvvmsu:101: vijñaptimātram idaṃ rūpādidharmapratibhāsam utpadyate na tu rūpādilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ ko 'py astīti viditvā |
T06vasvvmsu:102: yadi tarhi sarvathā dharmo nāsti tad api vijñaptimātraṃ nāstīti kathaṃ tarhi vyavasthāpyate
T06vasvvmsu:103: na khalu sarvathā dharmo nāstīty evaṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśo bhavati |
T06vasvvmsu:106: yo bālair dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo grāhyagrāhakādiḥ parikalpatas tena kalpitenātmanā teṣāṃ nairātmyaṃ na tv anabhilāpyenātmanā yo buddhānāṃ viṣaya iti |
T06vasvvmsu:107: evaṃ vijñaptimātrasyāpi vijñaptyantaraparikalpitenātmanā nairātmyapraveśāt vijñaptimātravyavasthāpanayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyapraveśo bhavati na tu tadastitvāpavādāt |
T06vasvvmsu:108: itarathā hi vijñapter api vijñaptyantaram arthaḥ syād iti vijñaptimātratvaṃ na sidhyetārthavatītvād vijñaptīnāṃ ||
T06vasvvmsu:109: kathaṃ punar idaṃ pratyetavyam anenābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā rūpādyāyatanāstitvam uktaṃ na punaḥ santy eva tāni yāni rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayībhavanti iti |
T06vasvvmsu:111: na tad ekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:112: na ca te saṃhatā yasmāt paramāṇur na sidhyati || 11 ||
T06vasvvmsu:115: yat tadrūpādikam āyatanaṃ rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayaḥ syāt tad ekaṃ vā syād yathāvayavirūpaṃ kalpyate vaiśeṣikaiḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:118: na tāvad ekaṃ viṣayo bhavaty avayavebhyo 'nyasyāvayavirūpasya kvacid apy agrahaṇāt |
T06vasvvmsu:121: yasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati ||
T06vasvvmsu:125: ṣaḍbhyo digbhyaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ paramāṇubhir yugapad yoge sati paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā prāpnoti |
T06vasvvmsu:128: atha ya evaikasya paramāṇor deśaḥ sa eva ṣaṇṇāṃ |
T06vasvvmsu:129: tena sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraḥ syāt parasparāvyatirekād iti na kaścit piṇḍo dṛśyaḥ syāt ||
T06vasvvmsu:132: saṃhatās tu parasparaṃ saṃyujyanta iti kāśmīravaibhāṣikās ta idaṃ praṣṭavyāḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:133: yaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ saṃghāto na sa tebhyo 'rthāntaram iti
T06vasvvmsu:137: atha saṃghātā apy anyonyaṃ na saṃyujyante |
T06vasvvmsu:138: na tarhi paramāṇūnāṃ niravayavatvāt saṃyogo na sidhyatīti vaktavyaṃ |
T06vasvvmsu:140: tasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati |
T06vasvvmsu:141: yadi ca paramāṇoḥ saṃyoga iṣyate yadi vā neṣyate |
T06vasvvmsu:143: anyo hi paramāṇoḥ pūrvadigbhāgo yāvad adhodigbhāga iti digbhāgabhede sati kathaṃ tadātmakasya paramāṇor ekatvaṃ yokṣyate |
T06vasvvmsu:144: chāyāvṛtī katha vā yady ekaikasya paramāṇor digbhāgabhedo na syād ādityodaye katham anyatra chāyā bhavaty anyatrātapaḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:145: na hi tasyānyaḥ pradeśo 'sti yatrātapo na syāt |
T06vasvvmsu:146: āvaraṇaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavati paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantareṇa yadi digbhāgabhedo neṣyate |
T06vasvvmsu:147: na hi kaścid api paramāṇoḥ parabhāgo 'sti
T06vasvvmsu:149: asati ca pratighāte sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ saṃghātaḥ (Vvs_8) paramāṇumātraḥ syād ity uktaṃ |
T06vasvvmsu:150: kim evaṃ neṣyate piṇḍasya te chāyāvṛtī na paramāṇor iti |
T06vasvvmsu:151: kiṃ khalu paramāṇubhyo 'nyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate yasya te syātāṃ |
T06vasvvmsu:153: anyo na piṇḍaś cen na tasya te || 14 ||
T06vasvvmsu:154: yadi nānyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate na te tasyeti siddhaṃ bhavati |
T06vasvvmsu:155: saṃniveśaparikalpa eṣaḥ paramāṇuḥ saṃghāta iti vā ||
T06vasvvmsu:161: yat tac cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayo nīlapītādikam iṣyate kiṃ tad ekaṃ dravyam atha vā tad anekam iti
T06vasvvmsu:164: ekatve na krameṇetir yugapan na grahāgrahau |
T06vasvvmsu:165: vicchinnānekavṛttiś ca sūkṣmānīkṣā ca no bhavet || 15 ||
T06vasvvmsu:166: yadi yāvad vicchinnaṃ nānekaṃ cakṣuṣo viṣayas tad ekaṃ dravyaṃ kalpyate pṛthivyāṃ krameṇetir na syād gamanam ity arthaḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:168: arvāgbhāgasya ca grahaṇaṃ parabhāgasya cāgrahaṇaṃ yugapan na syāt |
T06vasvvmsu:169: na hi tasyaiva tadānīṃ grahaṇaṃ cāgrahaṇaṃ ca yuktam |
T06vasvvmsu:170: vicchinnasya cānekasya hastyaśvādikasyaikatra vṛttir na syād yatraiva hy ekaṃ tatraivāparam iti kathaṃ tayor viccheda iṣyate |
T06vasvvmsu:171: kathaṃ vā tad ekaṃ yat prāptaṃ ca tābhyāṃ na ca prāptam antarāle tac chūnyagrahaṇāt |
T06vasvvmsu:172: sūkṣmāṇāṃ caudakajantūnāṃ sthūlaiḥ samānarūpāṇām anīkṣaṇaṃ na syād |
T06vasvvmsu:173: yadi lakṣaṇabhedād eva dravyāntaratvaṃ kalpyate nānyathā |
T06vasvvmsu:176: tasyāsiddhau rūpādīnāṃ cakṣurādiviṣayatvam asiddham iti siddhaṃ vijñaptimātraṃ bhavatīti ||
T06vasvvmsu:177: pramāṇavaśād astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā nirdhāryate sarveṣāṃ ca pramāṇānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ gariṣṭam ity asaty arthe katham iyaṃ buddhir bhavati pratyakṣam iti |
T06vasvvmsu:178: pratyakṣabuddhiḥ svapnādau yathā vināpy artheneti pūrvam eva jñāpitaṃ sā ca yadā tadā |
T06vasvvmsu:179: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ mataṃ || 16 ||
T06vasvvmsu:180: yadā ca sā pratyakṣabuddhir bhavatīdaṃ me pratyakṣam iti tadā na so 'rtho
T06vasvvmsu:181: dṛśyate manovijñānenaiva paricchedāc cakṣurvijñānasya ca tadā niruddhatvād iti kathaṃ tasya pratyakṣatvam iṣṭaṃ |
T06vasvvmsu:182: viśeṣeṇa tu kṣaṇikasya viṣayasya tadānīṃ (Vvs_9) niruddham evaṃ tad rūpaṃ rasādikaṃ vā ||
T06vasvvmsu:183: nānanubhūtaṃ manovijñānena smaryata ity avaśyam arthānubhavena bhavitavyaṃ tac ca darśanam ity evaṃ tadviṣayasya rūpādeḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ mataṃ |
T06vasvvmsu:186: uktaṃ yathā tadābhāsā vijñaptiḥ vināpy arthena yathārthābhāsā cakṣurvijñānādikā vijñaptir utpadyate tathoktaṃ |
T06vasvvmsu:188: tato hi vijñapteḥ smṛtisaṃprayuktā tatpratibhāsaiva rūpādivikalpikā manovijñaptir utpadyata iti na smṛtyutpādād arthānubhavaḥ sidhyati |
T06vasvvmsu:189: yadi yathā svapne vijñaptir abhūtārthaviṣayā tathā jāgrato 'pi syāt tathaiva tadabhāvaṃ lokaḥ svayam avagacchet |
T06vasvvmsu:191: tasmān na svapna ivārthopalabdhiḥ sarvā nirarthikā |
T06vasvvmsu:195: evaṃ vitathavikalpābhyāsavāsanānidrayā prasupto lokaḥ svapna ivābhūtam arthaṃ paśyan na prabuddhas tadabhāvaṃ yathāvan nāvagacchati |
T06vasvvmsu:196: yadā tu tatpratipakṣalokottaranirvikalpajñānalābhāt prabuddho bhavati tadā tatpṛṣṭhalabdhaśuddhalaukikajñānasaṃmukhībhāvād viṣayābhāvaṃ yathāvad avagacchatīti samānam etat ||
T06vasvvmsu:197: yadi svasaṃtānapariṇāmaviśeṣād eva satvānām arthapratibhāsā vijñaptaya utpadyante nārthaviśeṣāt
T06vasvvmsu:198: tadā ya eṣa pāpakalyāṇamitrasaṃparkāt sadasaddharmaśravaṇāc ca vijñaptiniyamaḥ sattvānāṃ sa kathaṃ sidhyati asati sadasatsaṃparke taddeśanāyāṃ ca |
T06vasvvmsu:200: sarveṣāṃ hi sattvānām anyonyavijñaptyādhipatyena mitho vijñapter niyamo bhavati yathāyogaṃ
T06vasvvmsu:202: ataḥ saṃtānāntaravijñaptiviśeṣāt saṃtānāntare vijñaptiviśeṣa utpadyate nārthaviśeṣāt |
T06vasvvmsu:203: yadi yathā svapne nirarthikā vijñaptir evaṃ jāgrato 'pi
T06vasvvmsu:204: syāt kasmāt kuśalākuśalasamudācāro suptāsuptayos tulyaṃ phalam iṣṭāniṣṭam āyatyāṃ na bhavati
T06vasvvmsu:207: idam atra kāraṇāṃ na tv arthasadbhāvaḥ ||
T06vasvvmsu:208: yadi vijñāptimātram evedaṃ na kasyacit kāyo 'sti na vāk ||
T06vasvvmsu:209: katham upakramyamāṇānām aurabhrikādibhir urabhrādīnāṃ (Vvs_10) maraṇaṃ bhavti |
T06vasvvmsu:210: atatkṛte vā tanmaraṇe katham aurabhrikādīnāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena yogo bhavati |
T06vasvvmsu:217: tathā paravijñaptiviśeṣādhipatyāt pareṣāṃ jīvitendriyavirodhinī kācid vikriyotpadyate yayā sabhāgasaṃtativicchedākhyaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavatīti veditavyaṃ ||
T06vasvvmsu:220: manodaṇḍasya hi mahāsāvadyatvaṃ sādhayatā bhagavatopālir gṛhapatiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ |
T06vasvvmsu:221: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kena tāni daṇḍakāraṇyāni mātaṅgāraṇyāni kaliṅgāraṇyāni śūnyāni medhyībhūtāni
T06vasvvmsu:223: śrutaṃ me bho gautama ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣeṇeti |
T06vasvvmsu:224: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati || 20 ||
T06vasvvmsu:226: tadabhiprasannair amānuṣais tadvāsinaḥ sattvā utsāditā na tv ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣān mṛtā ity evaṃ sati kathaṃ tena karmaṇā manodaṇḍaḥ kāyavāgdaṇḍābhyāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ siddho bhavati |
T06vasvvmsu:228: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ paracittavidaḥ kiṃ paracittaṃ jānanty atha na |
T06vasvvmsu:230: yadi na jānanti kathaṃ paracittavido bhavanti |
T06vasvvmsu:236: tathā tadajñānāt tadubhayaṃ na yathārthaṃ vitathapratibhāsatayā grāhyagrāhakavikalpasyāprahīṇatvāt
T06vasvvmsu:239: kṛteyaṃ sarvathā sā tu na cintyā
T06vasvvmsu:240: sarvaprakārā tu sā mādṛśaiś cintayituṃ na śakyate |
T06vasvvmsu:242: kasya punaḥ sā sarvathā gocara ity āha |
T06vasvvmsu:244: buddhānāṃ hi sā bhagavatāṃ sarvaprakāraṃ gocaraḥ sarvākārasarvajñeyajñānāvighātād iti ||
